mapper.select: SELECT q.*, (SELECT name FROM users u WHERE u.id=q.writer) name FROM (SELECT * FROM qna ORDER BY writeDate DESC) q WHERE rownum between #{currentPage}*10 and ((#{currentPage}+1)*10)-1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qna (id, writer, title, content) VALUES (qna_seq.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{content})
